name: Old School Illustrated Character Sheet
description:
A simple character sheet PDF with a hand-drawn border, compatible with the Dungeons & Dragons Dragon Quest Board Game from 1992. There are 3 pages. The proper character sheet, an optional Expanded Character Details page, and a Notes page.

All the pages with 2 options: with and without the title "Dragon Quest".

PDF Size: A4 (8.3”x11.7”)

These files are licensed for personal use only.
